description:
Comic Coloring Book includes a series of 4-picture stories that will take every kid into a great world of fun and friendship. You can find here cool illustrations, friendly colors, engaging stories, and a guaranteed portion of joy.

Time for the Hero and the Robot
In this set, together with the boy and the robot, we will go on a sea trip, meet a dinosaur who likes sweets, try to save a certain cat, and above all have fun. Our heroes will prove that you can find your adventure anywhereâ€”at home, in the garden, and even at breakfast.
name: Comic Coloring Book: Time for the Hero and the Robot
